description: Numbers n such that n^9 reversed is a prime.
mathematica: Select[ Range[ 3000 ], PrimeQ[ ToExpression[ StringReverse[ ToString[ #^9 ] ] ] ] & ]Select[Range[3000],PrimeQ[FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[#^9]]]]&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 29 2011 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 16 2001
